name: com.infinity.render-pipeline
description: The Infinity Render Pipeline is a high-fidelity Scriptable Render Pipeline built by Infinity Tech to target modern (Compute Shader compatible) platforms. The IRP utilizes Physically Based Lighting techniques, linear lighting, HDR lighting and a configurable Z-Binning ForwardPlus lighting architecture and gives you the tools you need to create games, technical demos, animations and more to a high graphical standard.
